name: Slimey's adventure
description:
this is my first big project that turned out great. in this game you play as a slime ball and you can stick to walls and jump far. even if this game seems like a simple game it is VERY hard and only has 17 levels it originally was going to have 20 but i ran out of ideas...

if you are interested you can watch my devlogs on youtube(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoiFmKIFz_hyES_t7XVtDbQ)
